prepare.start: Heads up, time to join! Between %{minPlayers} and %{maxPlayers} are required to play. If you haven't allowed PM yet you have to do it now. Once everyone who wants to play has joined, press the continue button to start.
prepare.refuse: A game is already going on in this chat.

round.startMessage:
Round %{round}/%{totalRounds}
%{leader} has to pick a word!

leader.word: It is your turn to pick a word for chat %{chat}! Reply to this message with your choice.
leader.definition: Perfect. Now reply to this message the correct definition of %{word}.

player.definition: %{leader} chose the word %{word} for this round. Now reply to this message your fake definition.

round.end: Got it! You can go back to group chat and wait for other players to enter their definition.
round.tooLongWordError: A word can be at most %{maxLength} long.
round.tooLongDefinitionError: A definition can be at most %{maxLength} long.
round.poll: Which is the correct definition of %{word}?
round.pollIntermission: You're not playing in this game, so your vote won't be considered.
round.invalidInteraction: Sorry, this message is not active anymore.

replyAlert: If you want to interact with me please reply to my messages (swipe left)
help:
The leader of the game will select an odd, unusual word from the dictionary. The goal is to select a word that no one has ever heard of before, and that the meaning would be really hard to guess. While the leader writes the correct definition, each player writes down a fake but credible definition for it. Next, the bot sends a poll with the shuffled definitions without specifying the author. The players have to vote on which one they think is the real definition.
Points:
 - players get %{guessPoints} pt. for guessing the correct definition, but if everyone guesses she gets %{everyoneGuessedPoints}
 - if everyone guesses correctly, the leader gets %{everyoneGuessedLeaderPoints} pt. 
 - otherwise she gets %{notEveryoneGuessedLeaderPoints} pt. 
 - furthermore, players get %{votePoints} pt. for every received vote 
After everyone has had a turn as leader, the person who has scored the most points wins!
